page.title: 09Housing in Heolgerrig
page.content: The main area in the block which has housing is the north east corner. The rest is just hillside with occasional farm houses. Heolgerrig is an old village,the houses on the main road are very old and are made of stone. There are other smaller new private housing estates in Heolgerrig. The largest is Shirley Gardens,Six Bells is next the smallest private housing estate is Andrews Close. Shirley Gardens was built in the nineteen sixties the same time as Six Bells. Andrews Close was built about eighteen years ago. Brondeg is a council estate which has only recently been modernized. A considerable number of houses have been built by people who have bought small plots of land for private buildingin the Heolgerrig area.
